name: kai satou dating simulator!
description:
a game where you can date kai satou!

this is my first ever visual novel/game! if there are any errors let me know. i kept it short and sweet, since its my first.

note: sorry the game is so tall. the character image files i imported were huge, so it was hard to fit it all on the screen.

leave a comment if you enjoyed, or have feedback of any sort.

i hope you enjoy your date with kai!!
